blocks.name: invrvald
blocks.content: If a matrix multiplied with a given matrix (from the left as well as from the right) results in the identity matrix, this matrix is the inverse (matrix) of the given matrix. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm invrvald(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cui, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cinvr, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c6, c3), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c3, c6, c0), c7))
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3))
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(co(c0, c6, c3), cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c6, c3), cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1)), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1))), wcel(c5, crg))
  unitgrpid(c5, c7, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), c1)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c2, c0), c3), wceq(co(c0, c6, c3), cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1)))), wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), cgrp), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), cgrp), wcel(c5, crg))
  unitgrp(c5, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), c1)
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7), wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c7))
  breqtrd(c0, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7, co(c3, c6, c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, c5), co(c3, c6, c0)), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  dvdsrmul(c0, c4, c3, cfv(cdsr, c5), c6, c5)
  breqtrd(c0, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c7, co(c3, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), co(c3, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c0)), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  dvdsrmul(c0, c4, c3, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), cfv(coppr, c5))
  syl5eq(co(c3, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c0), c7, co(c0, c6, c3), w0)
  opprmul(c3, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c0, c6, c4, c5, cfv(coppr, c5))
  isunit(c0, c1, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c5, cfv(coppr, c5))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c3, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7), wbr(c3, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c7))
  breqtrd(c3, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7, co(c0, c6, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c3, cfv(cdsr, c5), co(c0, c6, c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c0, c4))
  dvdsrmul(c3, c4, c0, cfv(cdsr, c5), c6, c5)
  breqtrd(c3, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c7, co(c0, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(c3, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), co(c0, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c3)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c0, c4))
  dvdsrmul(c3, c4, c0, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), cfv(coppr, c5))
  opprbas(c4, cfv(coppr, c5), c5)
  syl5eq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c3), c7, co(c3, c6, c0), w0)
  opprmul(c0, cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c3, c6, c4, c5, cfv(coppr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(coppr, c5)))
  isunit(c3, c1, cfv(cdsr, c5), c7, cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)), c5, cfv(coppr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, c5)))
  grpinvid1(co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), c0, c1, c3, c2, c6, cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1)))
  unitgrpbas(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), c5)
  ax-mp(wceq(c6, cfv(cplusg, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cui, c5)
  ressplusg(c1, universe, c6, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), cfv(cmgp, c5))
  mgpplusg(c6, cfv(cmgp, c5), c5)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c5))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1)))
  invrfval(c2, co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1), c1, c5)
  eqid(co(cfv(cmgp, c5), cress, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm invrvald(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(c2 ` c0)= c3))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(√ó ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(1r ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Unit ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(invr ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c6]c3)= c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c3[c6]c0)= c7)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, (c2 ` c0)= c3)
  mpbird(w0, (c2 ` c0)= c3, (c0[c6]c3)=(0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)))
  eqtrd((c0[c6]c3), (0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)), c7, w0)
  syl(w0, c7 =(0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)), c5 ‚àà Ring)
  unitgrpid(c5, c7, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), c1)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c2 ` c0)= c3 ‚Üî(c0[c6]c3)=(0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1))), ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c1)
  syl(w0, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)‚àà Grp, c5 ‚àà Ring)
  unitgrp(c5, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), c1)
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c0[(||r ` c5)]c7, c0[(||r `(oppR ` c5))]c7)
  breqtrd(c0, (||r ` c5), c7, (c3[c6]c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0[(||r ` c5)](c3[c6]c0), c0 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  dvdsrmul(c0, c4, c3, (||r ` c5), c6, c5)
  breqtrd(c0, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), c7, (c3[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0[(||r `(oppR ` c5))](c3[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c0), c0 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  dvdsrmul(c0, c4, c3, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), (√ó `(oppR ` c5)), (oppR ` c5))
  syl5eq((c3[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c0), c7, (c0[c6]c3), w0)
  opprmul(c3, (√ó `(oppR ` c5)), c0, c6, c4, c5, (oppR ` c5))
  isunit(c0, c1, (||r ` c5), c7, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), c5, (oppR ` c5))
  sylanbrc(w0, c3 ‚àà c1, c3[(||r ` c5)]c7, c3[(||r `(oppR ` c5))]c7)
  breqtrd(c3, (||r ` c5), c7, (c0[c6]c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c3[(||r ` c5)](c0[c6]c3), c3 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c4)
  dvdsrmul(c3, c4, c0, (||r ` c5), c6, c5)
  breqtrd(c3, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), c7, (c0[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c3[(||r `(oppR ` c5))](c0[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c3), c3 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c4)
  dvdsrmul(c3, c4, c0, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), (√ó `(oppR ` c5)), (oppR ` c5))
  opprbas(c4, (oppR ` c5), c5)
  syl5eq((c0[(√ó `(oppR ` c5))]c3), c7, (c3[c6]c0), w0)
  opprmul(c0, (√ó `(oppR ` c5)), c3, c6, c4, c5, (oppR ` c5))
  eqid((√ó `(oppR ` c5)))
  isunit(c3, c1, (||r ` c5), c7, (||r `(oppR ` c5)), c5, (oppR ` c5))
  eqid((||r ` c5))
  eqid((oppR ` c5))
  eqid((||r `(oppR ` c5)))
  grpinvid1(((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), c0, c1, c3, c2, c6, (0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)))
  unitgrpbas(c1, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), c5)
  ax-mp(c6 =(+ `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvexi(c1, cui, c5)
  ressplusg(c1, universe, c6, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), (mulGrp ` c5))
  mgpplusg(c6, (mulGrp ` c5), c5)
  eqid((mulGrp ` c5))
  eqid((0 `((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1)))
  invrfval(c2, ((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1), c1, c5)
  eqid(((mulGrp ` c5)[|`s]c1))
}

blocks.name: matinv
blocks.content: The inverse of a matrix is the adjunct of the matrix multiplied with the inverse of the determinant of the matrix if the determinant is a unit in the underlying ring. Proposition 4.16 in [Lang] p. 518. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm matinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wa(wcel(c1, c5), wceq(cfv(c6, c1), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c10, co(c11, cmat, c0))
  -| wceq(c9, co(c11, cmadu, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c11, cmdat, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c10))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cui, c10))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cui, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cinvr, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cinvr, c10))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cvsca, c10))
} = {
  invrvald(c1, c5, c6, co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1)), c2, c10, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(cur, c10), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wcel(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1)), c2), wcel(c10, clmod), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10))), wcel(cfv(c9, c1), c2))
  lmodvscl(c10, cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c9, c1), c2, c8, cfv(csca, c10))
  3eqtrd(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1))), cfv(cur, c10), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(c9, c1))), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10))), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1))), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(c9, c1)))), wcel(c10, casa), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c9, c1), c2))
  assaassr(c10, cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10)), c1, c2, cfv(c9, c1), cfv(cmulr, c10), c8, cfv(csca, c10))
  oveq2d(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(c9, c1)), co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(c9, c1)), co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  madurid(c1, c2, c0, cfv(cmulr, c10), c9, c3, c8, cfv(cur, c10), c10, c11)
  3eqtrd(co(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1)), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1), cfv(cur, c10), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c9, c1), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1)), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10))), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(c9, c1)), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c9, c1), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1))), wcel(c10, casa), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10))), wcel(cfv(c9, c1), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  ffvelrnd(c9, c1, c2, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4), wf(c9, c2, c2))
  maduf(c0, c9, c2, c10, c11)
  assaass(c10, cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c9, c1), c2, c1, c8, cfv(cmulr, c10), cfv(csca, c10))
  oveq2d(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c9, c1), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c9, c1), cfv(cmulr, c10), c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
  madulid(c1, c2, c0, c9, cfv(cmulr, c10), c3, c8, cfv(cur, c10), c10, c11)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c10))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10))), cfv(cur, c10), co(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(cur, c10)), co(cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c10)), c8, cfv(cur, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(cur, c10), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cur, cfv(csca, c10)), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cur, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cur, c0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
  unitlinv(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c4, c7, cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cur, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  oveqd(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c10)), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  fveq2d(cmulr, c0, cfv(csca, c10), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  fveq2d(cur, c0, cfv(csca, c10), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))
  syl13anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(c3, c1)), c8, cfv(cur, c10)), co(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), c8, co(cfv(c3, c1), c8, cfv(cur, c10)))), wcel(c10, clmod), wcel(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10))), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10))), wcel(cfv(cur, c10), c2))
  eleqtrd(cfv(c7, cfv(c3, c1)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c10)), cfv(cbs, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4)))

  crngring(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
  ringinvcl(c0, cfv(c3, c1), c4, c7, cfv(cbs, c0))

thm matinv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11) {

blocks.name: matunit
blocks.content: A matrix is a unit in the ring of matrices iff its determinant is a unit in the underlying ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm matunit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, co(c7, cmat, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c7, cmdat, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cui, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cui, c0))
} = {
  impbida(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c5))
  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c5), wceq(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(c4, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1))))

  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wf(c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mdetf(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c7, c6)

  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c4, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1))), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c4, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1))), cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c6)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)))
  fveq2d(c4, co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1)), cfv(cur, c6), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)))

  unitrinv(c6, c1, c3, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cinvr, c6), cfv(cur, c6))

  mdetmul(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1), c4, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cmulr, c0), c6, c7)
  3eqtr3d(co(cfv(c4, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1)), cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(cur, c0), cfv(c4, co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1), cfv(cmulr, c6), c1)), cfv(c4, cfv(cur, c6)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)))
  fveq2d(c4, co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1), cfv(cmulr, c6), c1), cfv(cur, c6), wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)))

  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, c3)), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c7, cfn), wcel(c0, crg))

  simplr(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  mdetmul(c0, cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1), c2, c1, c4, cfv(cmulr, c6), cfv(cmulr, c0), c6, c7)

  simpll(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3))

  eqid(cfv(cur, c0))
  3expa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c5), wcel(c1, c3))
  simpld(w3a(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c5)), wcel(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c6), c1), co(cfv(cfv(cinvr, c0), cfv(c4, c1)), cfv(cvsca, c6), cfv(co(c7, cmadu, c0), c1))))
  matinv(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c3, cfv(cinvr, c6), cfv(cinvr, c0), cfv(cvsca, c6), co(c7, cmadu, c0), c6, c7)
